snowball/snowball_create.pl - pgsql17devel-backend

Source code

  1. #!/usr/bin/perl

  3. # Copyright (c) 2024, PostgreSQL Global Development Group

  5. use strict;
  6. use warnings FATAL => 'all';
  7. use Getopt::Long;

  9. my $outdir_path = '';
  10. my $makefile_path = '';
  11. my $input_path = '';
  12. my $depfile;

  14. our @languages = qw(
  15.   arabic
  16.   armenian
  17.   basque
  18.   catalan
  19.   danish
  20.   dutch
  21.   english
  22.   finnish
  23.   french
  24.   german
  25.   greek
  26.   hindi
  27.   hungarian
  28.   indonesian
  29.   irish
  30.   italian
  31.   lithuanian
  32.   nepali
  33.   norwegian
  34.   portuguese
  35.   romanian
  36.   russian
  37.   serbian
  38.   spanish
  39.   swedish
  40.   tamil
  41.   turkish
  42.   yiddish
  43. );

  45. # Names of alternative dictionaries for all-ASCII words.  If not
  46. # listed, the language itself is used.  Note order dependency: Use of
  47. # some other language as ASCII dictionary must come after creation of
  48. # that language, so the "backup" language must be listed earlier in
  49. # @languages.

  51. our %ascii_languages = (
  52.     'hindi' => 'english',
  53.     'russian' => 'english',);

  55. GetOptions(
  56.     'depfile' => \$depfile,
  57.     'outdir:s' => \$outdir_path,
  58.     'input:s' => \$input_path) || usage();

  60. # Make sure input_path ends in a slash if needed.
  61. if ($input_path ne '' && substr($input_path, -1) ne '/')
  62. {
  63.     $outdir_path .= '/';
  64. }

  66. # Make sure outdir_path ends in a slash if needed.
  67. if ($outdir_path ne '' && substr($outdir_path, -1) ne '/')
  68. {
  69.     $outdir_path .= '/';
  70. }

  72. GenerateTsearchFiles();

  74. ‌sub usage
  75. {
  76.     die <<EOM;
  77. Usage: snowball_create.pl --input/-i <path> --outdir/-o <path>
  78.     --depfile       Write dependency file
  79.     --outdir        Output directory (default '.')
  80.     --input         Input directory

  82. snowball_create.pl creates snowball.sql from snowball.sql.in
  83. EOM
  84. }

  86. ‌sub GenerateTsearchFiles
  87. {
  88.     my $target = shift;
  89.     my $outdir_file = "$outdir_path/snowball_create.sql";

  91.     my $F;
  92.     my $D;
  93.     my $tmpl = read_file("$input_path/snowball.sql.in");

  95.     if ($depfile)
  96.     {
  97.         open($D, '>', "$outdir_path/snowball_create.dep")
  98.           || die "Could not write snowball_create.dep";
  99.     }

  101.     print $D "$outdir_file: $input_path/snowball.sql.in\n" if $depfile;
  102.     print $D "$outdir_file: $input_path/snowball_func.sql.in\n" if $depfile;

  104.     open($F, '>', $outdir_file)
  105.       || die "Could not write snowball_create.sql";

  107.     print $F "-- Language-specific snowball dictionaries\n";

  109.     print $F read_file("$input_path/snowball_func.sql.in");

  111.     foreach my $lang (@languages)
  112.     {
  113.         my $asclang = $ascii_languages{$lang} || $lang;
  114.         my $txt = $tmpl;
  115.         my $stop = '';
  116.         my $stopword_path = "$input_path/stopwords/$lang.stop";

  118.         if (-s "$stopword_path")
  119.         {
  120.             $stop = ", StopWords=$lang";

  122.             print $D "$outdir_file: $stopword_path\n" if $depfile;
  123.         }

  125.         $txt =~ s#_LANGNAME_#${lang}#gs;
  126.         $txt =~ s#_DICTNAME_#${lang}_stem#gs;
  127.         $txt =~ s#_CFGNAME_#${lang}#gs;
  128.         $txt =~ s#_ASCDICTNAME_#${asclang}_stem#gs;
  129.         $txt =~ s#_NONASCDICTNAME_#${lang}_stem#gs;
  130.         $txt =~ s#_STOPWORDS_#$stop#gs;
  131.         print $F $txt;
  132.     }
  133.     close($F);
  134.     close($D) if $depfile;
  135.     return;
  136. }


  139. ‌sub read_file
  140. {
  141.     my $filename = shift;
  142.     my $F;
  143.     local $/ = undef;
  144.     open($F, '<', $filename) || die "Could not open file $filename\n";
  145.     my $txt = <$F>;
  146.     close($F);

  148.     return $txt;
  149. }
